page.title: 13Villagers Home
page.content: A{Sennen}man,{Brian Jackson,}is again coming from{Canada}to his native village to give an organ recital to help the parish church on Sunday. Educated at{St Erbyn's School,Penzance and{Clifton College,Bristol,Brian {Jackson}was an organ scholar at{St {Peter's College Oxford}and then worked for the{BBC}before moving to{Canada sixteen years ago.There he has held posts as organist and choirmaster, as a lecturer at{Lakefield College}where {Prince Andrew}spent a year and as conductor of the{London Symphony {Orchestra.}He is now director of music for the{City of Kingston}in which he conducts the{Kingston Orchestra, supervises its choirs and lectures at the{University}.He recently gave an organ recital at{Kingston Cathedral.
